title: Sketchbook Folio, "Lake Shore and Distant Mountains", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: At right in foreground, small piece of land with trees and a small rowboat. At left and back, expanse of flat water. Opposite shore in far distance with mountains behind.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Lake Shore and Distant Mountains", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-39.
